name: Korean Fintech
description: Friendly and trustworthy financial UI with large radius and card-centered layout.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Friendly but secure. Trustworthy finance. Card-based layout with clear hierarchy.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Bring blue for actions (Trust). Light gray backgrounds with white cards.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Large border radius (16px+). Chunky buttons. Clear numbers/data display with bold weights.
